entities.name: colin creevey
entities.description: Colin Creevey is mentioned as being attacked and lying in the hospital wing. He is also mentioned as sitting next to Ginny Weasley in Charms class.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is mentioned as being distraught over Colin Creevey's attack and having nightmares. She is also mentioned as sitting next to Colin Creevey in Charms class.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as feeling that Fred and George are going the wrong way about cheering Ginny up.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as taking part in a prank to cheer up Ginny Weasley by covering himself with fur or boils and jumping out at her from behind statues.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as taking part in a prank to cheer up Ginny Weasley by covering himself with fur or boils and jumping out at her from behind statues.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as being apoplectic with rage over Fred and George's prank and threatening to write to Mrs Weasley about Ginny's nightmares.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is mentioned as buying a large, evil-smelling green amulet for protection.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as being the recipient of Percy's letter about Ginny's nightmares.

relationships.description: Fred and George are taking it in turns to cover themselves with fur or boils and jump out at her from behind statues to cheer her up.
Fred and George are taking it in turns to cover themselves with fur or boils and jump out at her from behind statues to cheer her up.
Percy is angry at Fred and George for their prank on Ginny Weasley.
